title: Front-end Developer Intern @
description: Improved usability of Finances Overview page, including fixing visual defects, building a new skeleton page, and enhancing data display in analytical charts.
Modified and added 45 unit tests to ensure proper behaviors and utilized Storybook to visualize, develop, and test components effectively.
Volunteered to investigate misleading data display problems reported by merchants; submitted GitHub tickets and collaborated with team members to resolve the issue.
Engaged in team activities including team sync, backlog refinement, and casual hangouts through Google Meet.

title: Application Developer @
description: Revamped home page with a new user interface and implemented server-side rendering for better search engine optimization.
Enabled KMAP engineers to add and reflect new data sets to map faster by developing a configuration file with customizable attributes, linking database to front-end components.
Integrated Mapbox APIs and generated more than 200,000 data points related to academic faculties.
Backfilled json data into MongoDB using Python scripts and built API endpoints using Node.js and Express.js for internal usage.

title: Programming Lab Assistant @
